title: I have had a S rank on 2 champions now and not received a chest for either of them.
body: I receive a S- on Ashe and a S on Sivir but not earned a single chest. The chest icon in the champion page is yellow but i haven't received the chest. Could someone explain why this has happened?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are any messages showing up the post-game lobby chat about earning the loot?

Perhaps one that says you're ineligible?
Thank you for replying, and no I have not received any messages like that.

You might try [submitting a ticket to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new).

They're better equipped to assist with account-specific inquiries.
